body: This small, brass hooded lantern gives off light as a daylight spell. If the bearer expends one use of mythic power, the lantern gives off light as a mythic daylight spell for 1 hour. While giving off light as mythic daylight, the lantern automatically dispels all non-mythic darkness spells or effects that come within its light.
